resources.string: By letting this application run in the background, you will be able to find out when you came in contact with someone who is sick.
Here you can anonomously update your health status. You will be notified if another user who has been near you has contracted COVID-19
Someone whom you were in close proximity with has updated their health status.
You can opt-in to share your data. Your data will only be accessed if you are ill
By signing up, you will agree to:
Monitoring and storing the people you come into contact with (identity remains unknown)
Enter the phone number. You will receive a unique code by SMS, which you will have to enter in the box below:
Enter the code received by SMS:
Covid Tracer: Someone you interacted with changed his status from: %1$s to %2$s
